Text:
Cid lets out a weary sigh as he watches a jubilant
Claire depart.
It's pointless...
Nothing but a waste of time.

I get that she's worried about me, and I do appreciate
the thought...

My actual abilities far outclass hers, so I wouldn’t
be learning anything, special training or not...

...Well, I guess it's only natural she doesn't
understand since she has no idea.

Cid looks up at the sky, thinking about what an
annoying situation he is in.

What am I gonna do... She's not the type to be like
"okay" if I just say straight out that I don't wanna
do it.
How can I get myself outta this...

...Maybe I'll just tell her point-blank that I don't
need it? Nah, if I did that, then...

What? Ridiculous! Try besting me first before you go
spouting such nonsense!
Yep, that would lead straight to training.

Maybe an excuse to the tune of "I've actually been
training on my own in secret" would work...
Oh really... And yet you were hauled off so easily?

That can only mean your regimen is insufficient. 
Now...come at me!

Nope, that's no good either. She'd whip out her sword
and be ready to go right then and there.

It's not really like me to refuse like this to begin
with, I guess.

I've always presented myself to my family and friends
as the type of meek crybaby that you can't help but
want to defend, after all.

That look she got when I said her name all sheepishly
a sec ago... Her protective instincts were fired up to
the max.

Okay, so acting out of character is a no-go. Any
divergences that pop up will be hard to fix down
the road.

Something about this makes Cid do a big stretch,
but the movement makes the large wound on his
chest twinge.
Ow...

*sigh* If it weren't for this stupid gash, then this
"special training" garbage probably would've never
even come up.

All the cuts and bruises I got when Zenon and his
goons put me through the wringer are already
healed.

Same goes for all the stuff on my face. I just put
some gauze on to conceal that.

...And this cut on my chest wasn't from Zenon and
his crew—no, Princess Alexia gave it to me when
she suddenly flipped her lid.

Cid recalls what happened after the kidnapping
was resolved, when he replied with a resounding
"no" to Alexia's desire to continue their relationship...

"As you can see, I'm really busy. I'd rather die than
be at the beck and call of some catty princess."
"My, is that so... Then by all means, please die!"
"Arrrrrgh!!!"
Dammit, what a spiteful piece of...

...This isn't going anywhere. If I can't avoid this
training, I may as well come up with a way to
get it over with as fast as possible.

Maybe I'll cut the session short and invite her to go
hang out. If I can dangle a different idea in front of
her, she should switch gears.
Cid stretches a bit more and walks off...
A few days later...
*pant, pant* I-I can't...take any more...
Oh, please. We've only just begun.
Now... On your feet, Cid!
(This, too, is for your own good...!)
I-I would, but...I...don't have any strength left...
Cid crouches weakly on the spot.
(Wh-What the... Is he truly that exhausted...?)

(Or could it be...the mental and physical damage he
suffered when he was tortured has yet to mend?)
Cid...?
*whimper, sniffle* W-Waaah...
W-Wait, don't tell me you're crying?!
I-I'm not... *sniff*

(He really is crying! Just like when he was a child! 
I can't believe this...)

...Wh-What's gotten into you? Normally you put in
much more effort than this!
A-Are you truly that miserable?
...I'm sorry, Claire. I-I'm so pathetic... *sniffle*
Hm... W-Well, just spit it out.

The truth is, I haven't been able to eat a bite of
food since I broke up with Alexia.

She suffered all that hardship, and I can't do a
thing to help her...!
And when I think of that, I... I... *whimper*
Cid...!

(Wait, he was that infatuated with the princess?!
I never heard a word of this!)

(But none of that matters now. To think that my
brother could feel such anguish on another's
behalf...)

(Complicated though the situation may be...as his
sister, I cannot ignore it!)
Cid... Look at me.
Huh...?

A single teardrop falls, causing Claire to look as if
her heartstrings are being tugged even harder.

Forgive me... I had no idea that you were
experiencing such turmoil...
I believe we've had enough training for today!

Let's go do something fun! Something that will wipe
all those unpleasant thoughts from your mind!
Really...? Oh, but I...don't have much money...
You little dunce. All of this will be my treat.
What? You mean it?

Of course I do. I'm your older sister. And besides,
I receive a stipend as an apprentice at the Knight
Order now. So don't you worry about a thing.
Wow, thanks! You're the best sister ever!
...Hehe. Now, let's be off!

Claire practically skips off while behind her, Cid
grins slightly.
...Hmph, all too easy.
